metadata.description: All hell breaks loose when a fateful accident sets in motion a series of terrifying events that will threaten the town of Riverdale like never before! It's up to Archie, Betty, Veronica and the gang to fight for their lives against the zombie hordes led by their former pal, Jughead... This magazine format presents the smash-hit Afterlife With Archie storyline and includes behind-the-scenes looks, stories from The Vault, and more!
metadata.name: Afterlife With Archie Magazine
